title: BeFrugal Unveils Newly Designed Website
text:
Cash back and coupon website adds product deals and faster payouts in time for holiday shopping season
Boston, MA (PRWEB) October 20, 2015
BeFrugal, the fastest growing coupon and cash back website in the US, is thrilled to announce the launch of a newly designed website. Updates include not only a fresh, modern design but also a number of exciting features including handpicked product deals, faster payouts and enhanced security.
Shoppers visiting BeFrugal will experience a clean and navigable layout on desktop and mobile devices, intended to make online shopping and searching for deals faster and easier. It’s simpler than ever to find one of the website’s 50,000 online, restaurant, grocery and printable coupons or to earn cash back at over 4,000 online stores.
BeFrugal’s new store pages highlight the most important information you need to know all in one place, including the store’s cash back rate, current coupons and deals. Shoppers can easily add a store to their “Favorites” for quick reference later, and optionally receive email alerts.
BeFrugal also unveiled several new features for shoppers at the time of redesign:
Product Deals
The newest way to save money at BeFrugal is with handpicked product deals from top stores across the web. Shoppers can search popular products listed at the lowest prices BeFrugal can find. Deals can be combined with coupons and cash back for even more savings.
Faster Payouts
BeFrugal now pays cash back customers faster. Previously for shoppers that requested cash back, payments were sent in an average of 30 days. Now BeFrugal sends payments within 10 business days. Payments are available by check, PayPal or Amazon gift card.
Enhanced Security
BeFrugal users can now add phone text message verification to their account. By adding a mobile phone number, those shopping through BeFrugal will receive text message security alerts, and can choose to require a texted code to log in. This two-factor authentication adds another element of security for users to keep their account protected.
“Our mission is always to provide shoppers with the best savings and the least hassle,” said Jon Lal, CEO and founder of BeFrugal.com. “This new and improved BeFrugal.com goes even further to accomplish that. We know our shoppers are savvy when it comes to saving money, and we believe they will love the easy, fresh design and the new features.”
Lal added, “Security is a major concern for today’s consumer and one of our team’s highest priorities. We added phone text message verification to give shoppers the option of added protection for their accounts, especially as we head into another busy holiday shopping season.”
Shoppers can start saving now at http://www.befrugal.com .
About BeFrugal
BeFrugal.com offers solutions for shoppers looking to save stress, time and money this holiday season. BeFrugal.com is a free cash back, coupon and deal website where you can shop at your favorite stores while saving an average of $27 per order and earning an average of 7% cash back. Holiday shoppers can combine coupons, deals and cash back for maximum savings at over 4,000 stores when they shop online this year. To learn more or to sign up for free and earn a $10 sign-up bonus, visit http://www.befrugal.com .
